eventDecorators.name: RequestCreated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when `requestExec` is called. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: RequestEnableOrDisableTimeoutStarted
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestDisableOrEnableTimestamps` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: RequestTokensRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestTokensRemoved` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

functionDecorators.name: requestBounties
functionDecorators.description: Maps execHashes to the 'bounty' tokens a bot will recieve for executing the request.

functionDecorators.name: requestCalldatas
functionDecorators.description: Maps execHashes to the calldata associated with the request.

functionDecorators.name: requestCreators
functionDecorators.description: Maps execHashes to the creator of each request.

parameterDecorators.name: task
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the "task" contract on L1 a bot should call with `calldata`.

parameterDecorators.name: l1calldata
parameterDecorators.description: The abi encoded calldata a bot should call the `task` with on L1.

parameterDecorators.name: gasLimit
parameterDecorators.description: The gas limit a bot should use on L1.

parameterDecorators.name: gasPrice
parameterDecorators.description: The gas price a bot should use on L1.

parameterDecorators.name: inputTokens
parameterDecorators.description: An array of token amounts that a bot will need on L1 to execute the request (`l1Token`s) along with the equivalent tokens that will be returned on L2 (`l2Token`s). `inputTokens` will not be awarded if the `task` reverts on L1.

parameterDecorators.name: bounties
parameterDecorators.description: An array of tokens that will be awarded to the bot who executes the request. Only 50% of the bounty will be paid to the bot if the `task` reverts on L1.

functionDecorators.name: requestExecWithTimeout
functionDecorators.description: Calls `requestExec` with all relevant parameters along with calling `cancel` with the `autoCancelDelay` argument. See `requestExec` and `cancel` for more information.

functionDecorators.name: requestGasLimits
functionDecorators.description: Maps execHashes to the gas limit a bot should use to execute the request.

functionDecorators.name: requestGasPrices
functionDecorators.description: Maps execHashes to the gas price a bot must use to execute the request.

functionDecorators.name: requestInputTokens
functionDecorators.description: Maps execHashes to the input tokens a bot must have to execute the request.

functionDecorators.name: requestTasks
functionDecorators.description: Maps execHashes to the address of the task associated with the request.
